pr_title: Support prefix option for Logback integration

timeline.bodyText:
How about just prefix? IIUC, the following example:
              RequestContextExporter
                      .builder()
                      .setDefaultExportPrefix("foo")
                      .addExportGroup(
                              ExportGroup
                                      .builder()
                                      .keyPattern("client.*")
                                      .build()
                      )
.. does not make client.* have foo prefix, so it'll be confusing to say foo is the default prefix.
set could be omitted.
timeline.author: trustin
trustin

timeline.bodyText:
We can make those collections immutable.
For example:
builtIns = ImmutableSet.builder();
builtIns.add(...)
new ExportGroup(builtIns.build(), ...)
timeline.author: ikhoon

timeline.bodyText: We can optimize this a bit by initializing this lazily. I think some features are not used when a user does not customize heavily. In that case, we can use ImmutableSet.of().
timeline.author: ikhoon

timeline.bodyText: Use ImmutableSet.toImmutableSet()?
timeline.author: ikhoon

timeline.bodyText:
I think <exportGroup> is an optional feature. Don't we need to initialize this by default.
How about make it @Nullable and initailzed it when it is actually used.
timeline.author: ikhoon

timeline.bodyText: Ditto. Use toImmutableSet()?
